name: MSX Best Games PRO
description:
- More than 140 games!


  The application is very light because both the games and the emulator are online, so you need to be connected to the internet when loading a game.
   You can play in vertical or horizontal mode and even activate the keyboard (MSX) if necessary.
  Play using the joystick (on screen) or emulator keyboard.
  You can also use external joystick or keyboard (bluetooth).
